ygData.subject: Re: IRL - Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: Well it s me again. I m sorry if my appology about my english is bothering you but I said that because I mean it. The fact is that I got a few mails about my
ygData.messageBody:
Well it's me again. I'm sorry if my appology about my english is bothering
you but I said that because I mean it. The fact is that I got a few mails
about my language and they weren't very pleasent to read. If you think my
english is good enough then I can say just one thing. Thanks god at least
one. Beleive me this is the first mail in which my english is mentioned as
something good. So I'll never write that appology about my language again.
I hope I didn't iritate you to much, If I did then I'm sorry I just wanted
to help.

Janko


On Tue, 24 Aug 1999, Jamie wrote:

> From: "Jamie" <bribed@...>
>
> Does it ever bother anyone else that people who say, "Sorry if you couldn't
> understand, English isn't my first language," often speak more coherently
> than about 70 -80% of the people whose first language it is? I mean, I meet
> people who have been speaking English their entire lives, and I guess its
> just degraded from over use. For all of those people out there who think
> they aren't being understood, don't worry about it, chances are you get your
> points across more clearly than we naturals do :)
>
>
> Taluvil
>
